item.title: 巴西 Azul 公司高管表示，公司目标是在 2026 年初退出破产保护程序
item.description: 巴西 Azul 航空公司机构和企业副总裁 Fabio Campos 在周五的新闻发布会上告诉记者，该公司的目标是在明年初退出破产保护程序。【原文：Brazilian airline Azul aims to exit Chapter 11 proceedings early next year, Fabio Campos, institutional and corporate vice-president, told reporters in a press conference on Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普关税事件中需要追踪的重要事件和日期
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策一波三折，不仅震撼了全球金融市场，也让投资者们坐上了过山车。【原文：The twists and turns in U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff policies have not only rattled global financial markets but have also taken investors on a roller-coaster ride.】

item.title: 德国数字部对网络平台征税持谨慎态度
item.description: 德国新成立的数字部表示，对网络平台征收的任何税费都必须经过国际协调，并且不会导致终端消费者的价格上涨。【原文：Germany's new digital ministry said any levy on online platforms would have to be internationally coordinated and not result in higher prices for end consumers, in a sign on Friday of possible divisions within government over plans for such a tax.】

item.title: 美国砍掉 24 个清洁能源项目，包括埃克森湾镇项目
item.description: 美国能源部周五表示，美国已取消了前总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）执政期间颁发的总额超过 37 亿美元的 24 个绿色能源项目，其中包括埃克森（Exxon）在得克萨斯州的一个炼油厂。【原文：The U.S. has axed awards to 24 green energy projects including to an Exxon refinery complex in Texas issued during former President Joe Biden's administration that totaled more than $3.7 billion, the Energy Department said on Friday.】

item.title: 数据库显示微软俄罗斯分公司将申请破产
item.description: 根据周五在官方 Fedresurs 注册表上公布的一份说明，微软公司在俄罗斯的一家子公司计划申请破产。【原文：One of Microsoft Corp's subsidiaries in Russia plans to file for bankruptcy, according to a note published on the official Fedresurs registry on Friday.】

item.title: Gap股价下滑，关税阴影笼罩服装制造商的扭亏计划
item.description: Gap 股价周五早盘下跌 20%，此前 Old Navy 的所有者警告称，美国关税将挤压今年的利润，尽管这家服装制造商希望通过供应链多元化和投资美国棉花来缓解这一打击。【原文：Gap shares fell 20% in early trading on Friday after the Old Navy owner warned that U.S. tariffs would squeeze this year's profit, even as the apparel maker aims to soften the blow by diversifying its supply chain and investing in U.S. cotton.】

item.title: 全球经济的 "糖衣炮弹 "暂时抵挡住了贸易大戏的冲击
item.description: 尽管围绕美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易关税闹得沸沸扬扬，但世界经济的表现却好于许多人的预期。【原文：For all the drama surrounding U.S. President Donald Trump's trade tariffs, the world economy is holding up better than many had expected.】

item.title: 巴西 Meliuz 公司发行股票购买比特币
item.description: 巴西金融科技公司Meliuz表示，该公司已申请首次发行股票，目的是为收购比特币筹集资金，定价时间定于6月12日。【原文：Brazilian fintech Meliuz said it has filed for a primary offering of shares with the aim of raising funds for the acquisition of bitcoin, with pricing scheduled for June 12.】

item.title: VIEW 美国 4 月通胀不温不火，消费支出放缓
item.description: 美国4月份的通胀情况良好，零售商可能仍在销售关税之前积累的库存。数据显示，个人消费支出（PCE）价格指数在3月份保持不变后，上个月上涨了0.1%。【原文：U.S. inflation was benign in April, with retailers likely still selling inventory accumulated before the tariffs. The Personal Consumption Expenditures (PCE) Price Index rose 0.1% last month after being unchanged in March, data showed.】

item.title: 美国 4 月消费支出放缓；通胀温和上升
item.description: 美国消费者支出在 4 月份小幅增长，原因是为抵御进口关税带来的价格上涨而采取的应急措施有所放缓。【原文：U.S. consumer spending increased marginally in April as a rush to beat higher prices from import duties slowed.】

item.title: 美国通胀降温，交易员继续押注美联储 9 月降息
item.description: 周五，以美联储政策利率为结算基准的期货交易者继续押注美国央行将在9月份下调短期借贷成本目标，此前美联储的目标通胀率在4月份降至2.1%。【原文：Traders of futures that settle to the Federal Reserve's policy rate continued to bet on Friday that the U.S. central bank will cut its target for short-term borrowing costs in September, after inflation by the Fed's targeted measure cooled to 2.1% in April.】

item.title: 美国 4 月商品贸易逆差大幅收窄，进口骤减
item.description: 美国 4 月份的货物贸易逆差大幅收窄，原因是在加征关税之前先行进口的提振作用逐渐减弱。【原文：The U.S. trade deficit in goods narrowed sharply in April as the boost from the front-running of imports ahead of tariffs faded.】

item.title: 对冲基金流动 SocGen 调查显示，对冲基金投资者希望基金经理能够进行宏观交易
item.description: 根据法国兴业银行对 322 家公司的调查，在全球市场因关税不确定性和贸易战停滞不前而动荡不安的背景下，利用宏观经济市场大波动进行交易的对冲基金已成为投资者的首选。【原文：Hedge funds that trade on big macroeconomic market swings have become a top pick for investors, according to a Societe Generale survey of 322 firms, against a backdrop of global markets roiled by tariff uncertainty and stop-start trade wars.】

item.title: 特朗普称中国 "完全违反 "与美国达成的日内瓦关税协议
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周五表示，中国违反了与美国达成的相互削减关键矿产品关税和贸易限制的协议，并发出了对中国政府采取更强硬态度的新的隐晦威胁。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Friday said China had violated an agreement with the U.S. to mutually roll back tariffs and trade restrictions for critical minerals and issued a new veiled threat to get tougher with Beijing.】

item.title: 工会称蒂森克虏伯在大修中危及 2 万个工作岗位
item.description: 德国 IG Metall 工会周五援引一名高级官员的话说，蒂森克虏伯最近计划转型为一家控股公司，该工会认为蒂森克虏伯约有五分之一的工作岗位面临风险。【原文：Germany's IG Metall union sees around a fifth of jobs at Thyssenkrupp at risk, a senior official was quoted as saying on Friday, following the conglomerate's recent plans to turn into a holding company.】

item.title: 油气公司 EOG 通过 56 亿美元的恩西诺交易加强了在尤蒂卡的布局
item.description: EOG Resources 周五表示，该公司将以 56 亿美元（包括债务）收购美国油气生产商 Encino Acquisition Partners，以加强其在尤蒂卡页岩地区的布局。【原文：EOG Resources said on Friday it is acquiring U.S. oil and gas producer Encino Acquisition Partners for $5.6 billion, including debt, to strengthen its Utica shale footprint.】

item.title: 独家报道矿商淡水河谷错过扩建巴西镍矿联合企业的最后期限
item.description: 巴西电网运营商 ONS 告诉路透社，该公司拒绝了矿商淡水河谷提出的增加其北部 Onca Puma 镍矿联合企业用电量的请求，因为该公司错过了确认竞标的最后期限。【原文：Brazilian power grid operator ONS told Reuters it denied miner Vale's request to increase power consumption at its northern Onca Puma nickel complex, after missing a deadline to confirm the bid.】

item.title: 受贸易紧张局势影响，美国股票基金迎来每周赎回潮
item.description: 截至5月28日的一周内，美国股票基金连续第二周面临资金外流，原因是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税威胁和对借贷成本上升的担忧促使投资者削减对美国资产的投资。【原文：U.S. equity funds faced a second successive weekly outflow in the week through May 28 as tariff threats from President Donald Trump and concerns over rising borrowing costs prompted investors to cut exposure to U.S. assets.】

item.title: 欧佩克+加息、贸易担忧挥之不去，油价前景黯淡
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，由于欧佩克+供应膨胀以及贸易争端对燃料需求影响的不确定性挥之不去，分析师连续第三个月下调了油价预测。【原文：Analysts have revised down their oil price forecasts for the third consecutive month as swelling OPEC+ supply and lingering uncertainty around the impact of trade disputes on fuel demand weigh on prices, a Reuters poll showed.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Zara 创始人奥特加以 2.83 亿美元买下巴塞罗那办公楼
item.description: 周五，两位熟悉交易的消息人士称，Zara 创始人 Amancio Ortega 以 2.5 亿欧元（2.83 亿美元）的价格从 Blackstone 手中买下了巴塞罗那的一栋办公楼。【原文：Zara founder Amancio Ortega has bought an office building in Barcelona from Blackstone for 250 million euros ($283 million), two sources familiar with the transaction said on Friday.】

item.title: 关税担忧导致全球股票基金第二周资金外流
item.description: 截至5月28日，全球股票基金连续第二周出现资金外流，原因是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁对欧盟进口商品和海外生产的苹果手机征收关税后，避险情绪升温，同时长期限债券收益率飙升。【原文：Global equity funds posted outflows for a second straight week through May 28, as risk aversion rose following U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff threats on EU imports and overseas-made iPhones, alongside a spike in long-tenor bond yields.】

item.title: 标普以美国关税和中国市场竞争为由下调沃尔沃汽车评级展望
item.description: S&P周五将沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Cars）的BB+信用评级展望从 "稳定 "下调至 "负面"，称美国关税和中国更激烈的竞争正在损害该公司的增长前景。【原文：S&P on Friday lowered the outlook for its BB+ credit rating on Volvo Cars to "negative" from "stable", saying U.S. tariffs and tougher competition in China were hurting the company's growth prospects.】

item.title: 尽管西芒杜供应迫在眉睫，但铁矿石悲观情绪有所减弱
item.description: 分析师和贸易商表示，由于今年全球过剩量低于预期，铁矿石价格前景正在改善，但几内亚西芒杜巨型项目的新供应量迫在眉睫，这仍是铁矿石价格长期下行的一个风险。【原文：The prospects for iron ore prices are improving thanks to a lower than expected global surplus this year, analysts and traders say, though looming new supply from the giant Simandou project in Guinea remains a long-term downside risk for prices.】

item.title: 早间竞标：关税回归与资本税担忧
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 吸烟者肺部用药的试验数据好坏参半，导致 Regeneron 股价下滑
item.description: Regeneron 公司治疗一种俗称 "吸烟肺 "的肺部疾病患者的实验性药物在一项后期试验中失败，但在另一项试验中获得成功，因此该公司股价在周五收盘前下跌了近 13%。【原文：Regeneron shares fell nearly 13% before the bell on Friday after its experimental drug for patients with a type of lung condition commonly called "smoker's lung" failed a late-stage trial, although it succeeded in another.】

item.title: 德债锚可防止欧元区曲线过度陡峭化
item.description: 由于对高债务和债券销售的担忧，全球政府债券大跌，欧元区也未能幸免，但德国日益增长的避险地位应能保护欧元区免受长期借贷成本过度上升的影响。【原文：A global selloff in government bonds due to concerns over high debt and bond sales has not left the euro zone unscathed, but Germany's growing safe-haven status should shield the bloc from an excessive rise in long-term borrowing costs.】

item.title: 法院作出最新裁决后，特朗普的关税政策保持不变，华尔街期货下跌
item.description: 华尔街期货周五下滑，原因是投资者考虑到上诉法院决定撤销此前阻止美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收大部分关税的裁决。【原文：Wall Street futures slipped on Friday, as investors took stock of an appeals court decision to undo a prior ruling that had blocked most of U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs, heading into the last trading day of a solid month for equities.】

item.title: 4 月份中国外资品牌手机销量上升
item.description: 一家政府下属研究公司周五公布的数据显示，包括苹果公司 iPhone 手机在内的外国品牌手机 4 月份在中国的销量有所上升。【原文：Sales of foreign-branded mobile phones in China, including Apple Inc's iPhones, edged up in April, according to data released by a government-affiliated research company on Friday.】

item.title: 税收法案包含特朗普报复外国数字税的 "大锤
item.description: 根据美国国会正在审议的全面税收法案中的一项条款，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将有权对那些向亚马逊和 Alphabet 等美国大型科技公司征收特殊数字服务税的国家进行报复。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump would have the power to retaliate against countries that impose special digital service taxes on large U.S. technology companies like Amazon and Alphabet, under a provision in the sweeping tax bill that Congress is considering.】

item.title: 墨西哥希望尽早审议《美国与墨西哥关于建立更紧密经贸关系的协定》（USMCA）能够结束不确定性，重振投资信心
item.description: 投资下降、经济增长放缓以及美国总统唐纳德-特朗普不断变化的奇思妙想促使墨西哥支持尽早审查美国-墨西哥-加拿大（USMCA）贸易协定，这与墨西哥之前打算尽可能拖延时间的计划大相径庭。【原文：Falling investment, slowing growth, and the changing whims of U.S. President Donald Trump have led Mexico to support an early review of the U.S.-Mexico-Canada (USMCA) trade agreement, a sharp U-turn on its previous plan to hold off for as long as possible.】
